name: Harold, Herald of Haroldovia
description:
I'll add a proper description later, probably some time after the Haroldverse Jam is over. 

Features:

  • Harold.  Lots of Harold.
  • Challenging turn-based combat.
  • Option to switch between Active and Wait ATB modes.
  • (Hopefully) around 45 minutes of gameplay.
  • Three characters, each with different battle mechanics and ways of acquiring new skills.

Learning new skills for each character:

  • Harold:  Each of Harold's weapons has skills associated with it, and he can change weapons mid-combat.
  • Harriet:  Randomly using her skills will unlock new skills.
  • The Archivist:  Able to learn blue magic spells used against her by enemies.

Enjoy!
